function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient local electricity production and storage for EV charging","Impact":"Inability to charge electric vehicles affects transportation and reduces resilience to power outages.","Mitigation":"Invest in local electricity production and storage solutions, and explore alternative transportation options.","Technologies":"Renewable energy sources, energy storage systems, and smart grid integration.","People":"Building occupants, hospital staff, and visitors with electric vehicles.","Owner":"Building management, hospital administration, energy providers."},{"Description":"Simultaneous heating and cooling limitations","Impact":"Inefficient use of energy, discomfort for occupants, and potential for uneven temperature distribution throughout the building.","Mitigation":"Implement advanced HVAC control systems, optimize heating and cooling schedules, and improve insulation and building envelope.","Technologies":"HVAC zoning systems, building energy management systems, occupancy sensors, and smart thermostats.","People":"Building occupants, hospital staff, and visitors.","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance team, HVAC technicians."},{"Description":"Lack of smart grid integration","Impact":"Missed opportunities for energy optimization, flexibility, and resilience in the face of demand fluctuations and grid outages.","Mitigation":"Integrate smart grid technology, demand response programs, and energy management systems to enhance grid interaction and energy efficiency.","Technologies":"Smart grid communication platforms, demand response software, energy management systems, and grid-interactive building technologies.","People":"Building occupants, hospital administrators, and energy grid operators.","Owner":"Building management, energy providers, and grid operators."}]}
